author: vors
body:
In https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/1091/files#diff-db483e955ddd6b0522e88582ad86cc09R1411

we discussed, what's the right `#if` to define set of built-in snapins.

We need to close on it

Relevant bug #1042

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I think the right define is `PORTABLE` as @lzybkr and I decided on in the `ConsoleHost`. I see no reason to change this again (was previously `OPEN`).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: It's defined now, for both Windows and Linux Core PowerShell builds (i.e. not FullCLR, but everything else).

title: PORTABLE define in System.Management.Automation
